title: Game crash on mac
body:
Hi, so I am new to league and yesterday I played my first game which worked fine even on highest setting, but when I tried to play a another game afterwards the client would close like usual after character selection and the game would launch. I would then load to around 45 to 50â„… and then the game would just quit, and I would get an error from the bugsplat thing, I tried to reconnect but the game did the exact same thing every time.

The specks of my Mac are 
Intel core i5 1.6 to 2.7 GHz
4GB of ram
Intel HD graphics 6000 with 1536MB of memory
It is also a school laptop my friends ones work fine but mine has some sort of game issue I have already reinstalled the game and changed to lowest settings but it won't launch.
Could someone please help me fix this issue

replies.body:
If you're always crashing around 50% on the champion loading screen, the main concern might be some kind of corrupted game file. It seems like every time the client tries to load that specific game asset, it can't and then crashes. Look over our [**Bug Splat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) so we can try to narrow down what exactly is crashing your game.

Let me know if you have any questions!
